name: The Dev Brawl | Universal Fighting Engine 2 Demo
name_original: The Dev Brawl | Universal Fighting Engine 2 Demo
description:
This is the demo game made for the Universal Fighting engine 2 Tutorial Series. Here's a link to that if you haven't watched it.  

Thanks to @Barji , @Dani , @Let's Talk Game Design , @Mix and Jam , and @Etra's Games For Non-Gamers for their characters!
